short_description: ONE-CLICK SELF-CLEANING BRUSH – Simple push-button design retracts the bristles and releases collected hair in one second, making cleaning fast and hygienic.
EFFECTIVE DESHEDDING FOR CATS & DOGS – Fine stainless-steel pins remove loose hair, undercoat, tangles and dander from long- and short-haired pets, helping reduce shedding.
SAFE, SKIN-FRIENDLY BRISTLES – Rounded pin tips are gentle on sensitive skin, providing a soothing massage while grooming to support a healthy, shiny coat.
ANTI-SLIP ERGONOMIC HANDLE – Textured, non-slip handle offers a secure, comfortable grip and better control, reducing hand fatigue during regular brushing.

Helps dogs grind their teeth and reduce dental problems. Consumes the dog's energy to avoid destructive behavior. Exercises the dog's intelligence and reaction ability during play and enhances the interaction and relationship between the owner and the dog.
product_description: Keep Your Pet & Home Spotless: The Depets Self-Cleaning Pet Grooming Brush effortlessly lifts loose fur, stubborn mats, dander, and dirt from your dog or cat—leaving your furry companion’s coat sleek and your living space free of messy shedding. Enjoy a fresher, more hygienic home while keeping your pet looking their best! Gentle Grooming = Happy, Healthy Pets: Featuring stainless steel needles with rounded bead tips and a 60° angled design, this brush glides smoothly through fur to reach the undercoat without scratching sensitive skin. The gentle bristles double as a soothing massage tool, boosting blood circulation and turning grooming into a relaxing treat your pet will crave. One-Click Clean & Washable Design: No more tedious hair picking! Just press the convenient release button to eject trapped fur in seconds—grooming cleanup has never been easier. Plus, the entire brush is washable, so you can keep it fresh and hygienic for every use. Ergonomic Non-Slip Handle for Comfort: Designed with a soft, anti-slip grip, this brush fits perfectly in your hand and reduces fatigue during long grooming sessions. The handle’s ergonomic shape even provides a subtle hand massage, making pet care comfortable for you too! Strengthen Your Bond Through Grooming: Grooming isn’t just about looks—it’s quality time with your pet! This versatile brush works wonders for both long-haired and short-haired dogs/cats (note: not suitable for curly-haired, wire-haired, or hairless breeds). With Depets’ gentle, effective design, your pet will look forward to every brushing session, while you enjoy a closer connection and a cleaner home.
